main.name: Walter McCone
main.description: Full Stack Engineer and Sales Person. I have 10+ years in the SaaS industry with 9 of those years in recruiting software.
main.bio: My name is Walter McCone, I recently completed the Coding Bootcamp at the University of Texas. I have 10+ years in the SaaS industry with 8 of those years in recruiting software. While I am currently a Sales person, I look forward to growing my skillsets in the software industry as I learn to code. I hope that one day I will be able to code as a full time engineer.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Completed an intensive 24-week coding bootcamp in which I learned about various web technologies from the MERN Stack as well as other technologies integral to the foundations of Software Engineering.

work.title: Strategic Account Executive & Territory Consultant
work.description: My role as a Strategic Account Manager consists of maintaining and growing the relationship between CareerPlug and our largest client. While there is a sales component, my main focus is working with over 500+ territory leaders to help their market understand the CareerPlug software and the hiring strategies needed to hire the right talent.
